      • loadFromUrl

        public static java.awt.Image loadFromUrl(java.net.URL url,
                                         java.lang.Class aClass,
                                         int flags,
                                         java.awt.image.ImageFilter [] filters,
                                         ScaleContext scaleContext)
        Loads an image of available resolution (1x, 2x, ...) and scales to address the provided scale context. Then wraps the image with JBHiDPIScaledImage if necessary.
